researcher.description: Orchestrates sub-agents to map and document the current codebase state. Synthesizes research reports without making code changes.

planner.description: Creates detailed technical specifications and implementation plans. Verifies assumptions against live code before planning.

implementor.description: Executes implementation plans phase-by-phase with strict human checkpoints. Requires a plan before making code changes.

codebase-locator.description: Quickly locates files, directories, and code patterns by keyword or name. Use for finding components and understanding structure.

codebase-analyzer.description: Explains how code works by tracing execution paths and data flow. Use for understanding implementation details.

codebase-pattern-finder.description: Finds code examples and usage patterns in the codebase. Use for discovering conventions and how features are typically implemented.

thoughts-locator.description: Searches the thoughts/ directory for historical context, design docs, tickets, and notes. Use for finding project documentation.

thoughts-analyzer.description: Extracts key decisions, specifications, and constraints from historical documents. Use for understanding past decisions.

web-search-researcher.description: Researches external libraries, APIs, and best practices. Validates library usage and finds up-to-date documentation.
